syllabus.description: Complete science syllabus for Years 3-6 covering biology, chemistry and physics fundamentals.

syllabus.description: Key Stage 3 mathematics curriculum including number, algebra, ratio, geometry and statistics.

syllabus.description: AQA GCSE Biology specification covering cell biology, organisation, infection and response.

syllabus.description: Edexcel GCSE Chemistry specification including atomic structure, bonding, quantitative chemistry.

syllabus.description: OCR Gateway GCSE Physics syllabus covering energy, electricity, magnetism and waves.

syllabus.description: AQA A-Level Biology specification covering biological molecules, cells, genetics and ecology.
